# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.FPU property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Floating Point Unit On-Chip. A value of true indicates that processor contains an x87 FPU.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: FPU
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey FPU { get; }
```
